attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app all I wanted was to get updates and see where our president would be for rallies. And everything was going amazing until approximately two fortnights prior to me writing this review. I was using the app just minding my own business when I heard an incessant scratching sound coming from underneath my bed. I was home alone at the time and opted to stay inside to avoid the riots led by angry people in my home city of Minneapolis. Like why do people think itâ€™s okay to burn down the entire city. All the police officer did was suffocate a man for almost 9 minutes. He was black so it didnâ€™t really count. Honestly this would be a bigger problem if the it was a full human, it was only 3/5 of one so it clearly doesnâ€™t warrant the reaction it has received. But back to what I was saying, there was an incessant scratching noise on the underside of my bed. So I sat up and closed the app and turned on my flashlight. I used it to shine light under my bed and peaked under. You wouldnâ€™t believe what I saw. A CREATURE. It was hunched and covered in blubber. I was a freakish orange tint and gave off a pungent stench that seeped into my nostrils and assaulted my very being. As you have probably guessed by now it was the very same man who was my president. I was absolutely delighted he paid a visit to my humble abode. And when I offered him food and a comfortable bed he refused and said he would rather stay under my bed than face the angry mobs of people outside my home. Which is understandable. Why should the leader of our country be held accountable for his mistakes, that clearly unacceptable. To summarize everything, the reason I gave this app a one star rating was because of the terrible stench of injustice, misogyny, pedophilia, racism, homophobia and disease it left under my bed.
